content.rendered:
Our Mission

Helping small businesses grow by launching affordable and scalable web design projects.

About Clio

Clio Websites is a full service website design and digital marketing company based in Calgary. Our company was established in 2007 and we have been helping clients grow ever since.

Calgary is a special place and we 🤍 the local small business community.  If you are looking for a team that can grow your business, we would be happy to help.

We have vast experience in responsive website design, website maintenance, WordPress development and support, and online marketing.

Clio offers free consultations, and free website evaluations to help you get started. We offer interest-free payment plans and we receive glowing reviews from our clients. Contact us today.

Our Services

responsive web design

Modern, responsive web design services for your small business. We use the latest technology guaranteed to look awesome on any device.

SEO

We use proven search engine optimization (SEO) and search engine marketing (SEM) strategies. Promote your business and drive traffic to your website. Learn more about our SEO services.

wordpress experts

If you are looking for a Calgary based WordPress expert, look no further. We have helped many clients set up blogs, e-commerce solutions, and much more.

maintenance and support

We make sure your website runs reliably, securely, and blazing fast. Clio can also keep your website up to date with fresh content and features. Find out more.

Contact Us

If you have any questions, or want to get started today, get in touch with us.
Contact Us

Growth Acceleration

Here is how we  help our clients grow. Check out our case studies.

Went from a few dozen visitors per month to thousands per day. They are now generating thousands of dollars of organic traffic each month. We were able to achieve this through a collaborative effort focused on content creation and careful marketing planning.
Canada Immigration and Visa Services
Delivered a rescue project and moved this busy international website to a stable and supported platform. The client can now focus on rolling out functionality to help them grow. Automated manual processes using the new WordPress website so that the clients can focus on valuable tasks.
International Society for the Scholarship of Teaching and Learning
From a slow website which was experiencing daily outages to a stable and fast site that has increased traffic by 40%. This has led to a ranking increase and increased sales.
hemp-joy.com

Our Process

Step 1

Requirements Gathering
📅

Step 1

We start by listening to your needs and requirements. This is called the requirements gathering phase.

We will ask questions such as:

What inspired you to start your business and what sets you apart from your competition?

Step 2

Planning Phase
🗒️

Step 2

In this phase, we determine what type of content and functionality is required.

We will also develop a wire-frame and a template for your website based on your taste and preferences.

Step 3

Design and Development
🛠️

Step 3

Once the planning phase is complete, we begin the design and development phase.

During this phase, we will start loading your website with content and checking security and performance.

Step 4

Testing and Validation
🧪

Step 4

In the next stage, we start testing and validating the website with your help.

We will ensure that the site will perform to your expectations once you start receiving lots of traffic.

Step 5

Launch
🚀

Step 5

Once you are satisfied with the results, we will launch your website.

Step 6

Maintenance and Support
🤝

Step 6

The last step of the process is the support and maintenance phase.

Once the site is launched we will monitor it to ensure that it’s secure and performing well for your users.

What sets Clio Websites Apart

Here are a few things that set us apart from the competition. Clio Websites:

  • Offers competitive pricing and flexible payment options
  • Is a premier Calgary web design company with WordPress expertise
  • Has years of experience helping small businesses achieve their online goals
  • Spends the time to understand your business needs and requirements
  • Has a very high customer satisfaction and retention rate (over 98%)
  • Prides ourselves on the quality of service we provide to each and every client
  • Is responsive and won’t leave you hanging for days when you need support the most
  • Creates custom websites for each project to separate you from your competition

Helping You Meet Your Goals

If your goal is to have a simple online presence so your clients can find you on Google, great. But as your website and your needs change, we can help you grow.

Clio Websites is a Calgary website development company with a proven track record.

We have taken over and successfully executed many “website rescue projects”. Although there are many local web design companies and web designers, we constantly outwork and outperform our competition.

Work With Us

Get in touch with us to discuss your next website project!
Contact Us
